name: wherefrom
slogan: Influence to consumers. Responsibility to brands
description:
We’ve created a true free-market incentive for brands to become more sustainable. With the help of consumers, we’re scoring the sustainability of every single product that people can buy - and using these scores to drive brands to improve. 

It empowers companies to share insights on their sustainability and ideological strengths. It also helps consumers & retailers to better understand the products they’re buying and the companies behind them.

team.name: David Cook
team.bioHtml: Co-founder @wherefrom @Soho6 || Previously @Avg Technologies & @Depop

team.title: Operations & Growth Manager
team.name: Fabiana Copelli
team.bioHtml: Fluently bilingual, Environmental Studies and Sommelier graduate with several years working in support/administrative roles within multidisciplinary teams.

jobs.title: Head of Growth
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About wherefrom
Our mission is to give influence to consumers and responsibility to brands.
We’ve created a true free-market incentive for brands to become more sustainable. With the help of consumers, we’re scoring the sustainability of every single product that people can buy - and using these scores to drive brands to improve.

We are a small, passionate team comprised of young and fun international individuals. We’re expanding quickly and looking for people who are eager to have a meaningful impact on the planet and contribute to a sustainable economy. Also, if you have a sense of humour and love good food you’ll fit right in!

Think you’d be a good fit? We’d love to hear from you.

Job Summary
You'll lead the development and delivery of our digital marketing strategy. You'll effectively deliver marketing activity that drives awareness of wherefrom. The ideal candidate will have experience in outbound and inbound marketing activities, and a creative mind. A keen interest in sustainability is a must.

Responsibilities

  • Working with the creative team, develop creative briefs and guide creative direction for all marketing, acquisition and public facing campaigns;
  • Execute and manage multi-channel campaigns ensuring the alignment of communications and messaging across all channels;
  • Manage content strategy, planning and execution as well as establishing budget guidelines, participating in events, documenting business processes, and providing additional sales support;
  • Gather customer and market insights to inform outreach strategy, increase customer conversions, and generate more qualified leads;
  • Analyze customer insights, consumer trends, market analysis, and marketing best practices to build successful strategies;
  • Identify effectiveness and impact of current marketing initiatives with tracking and analysis, and optimise accordingly; and
  • Present ideas and final deliverables to internal and external teams, and communicate with senior team about marketing programs, strategies, and budgets.

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business or related field;
  • Minimum 5 years experience with marketing or advertising;
  • Keen interest in sustainability and sustainable consumption;
  • Experience with programmatic advertising;
  • Experience with content development, campaigns and promotions;
  • Knowledge of numerous different marketing channels, and how to best utilise them to deliver effective marketing;
  • Significant experience of delivering marketing campaigns that are integrated and cohesive across a range of channels;
  • Proficient with online marketing and social media strategy;
  • Proven experience in managing budgets effectively;
  • Knowledge of relevant markets, latest trends and best practices in marketing (i.e. re-marketing, personalisation, behavioural economics, agile); and
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

jobs.title: Senior Full Stack Web Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About wherefrom
Our mission is to give influence to consumers and responsibility to brands.
We’ve created a true free-market incentive for brands to become more sustainable. With the help of consumers, we’re scoring the sustainability of every single product that people can buy - and using these scores to drive brands to improve.

We are a small, passionate team comprised of young and fun international individuals. We’re expanding quickly and looking for people who are eager to have a meaningful impact on the planet and contribute to a sustainable economy. Also, if you have a sense of humour and love good food you’ll fit right in!

Think you’d be a good fit? We’d love to hear from you.

Job Summary
We are looking for a senior developer to join our team. A keen interest in sustainability is highly desirable.

You should be comfortable with both front and back end development. You would be responsible for developing and designing front end web architecture, ensuring the responsiveness of applications and working alongside Graphic Designers and Product Owners for web design features and requirements, among other duties.

Responsibilities

  • Developing front end website architecture;
  • Designing user interactions on web pages;
  • Developing back end website applications;
  • Creating servers and databases for functionality;
  • Ensuring cross-platform optimisation for mobile devices;
  • Ensuring responsiveness of applications;
  • Working alongside graphic designers for web design features;
  • Seeing through a project from conception to finished product;
  • Designing and developing APIs;
  • Meeting both technical and consumer needs; and
  • Staying abreast of developments in web applications and programming languages.

You'll be working on projects like:

  • Brand Product pages;
  • Commercial API and Data Delivery; and
  • Consumer Product Search.

Requirements

  • Proficiency with fundamental front end languages (HTML, CSS & JavaScript);
  • Experience and familiarity with JavaScript frameworks such as Angular, React, Vue and NodeJS;
  • Proficiency with server side languages such as Python, Ruby, Java, PHP and .Net;
  • Familiarity with database technology such as MySQL, Oracle and MongoDB;
  • Excellent verbal communication skills;
  • Knowledge of object-oriented programming and design;
  • Good problem solving skills; and
  • Attention to detail.
